posts.title: Meet the five books in the shortlist for The Booker Prize 2019
posts.excerpt: The shortlist for The Book Prize 2019 includes the latest from Margaret Atwood and Salman Rushdie, among others. Meet the finalists and get on reading.

posts.title: Five prestigious book awards to help you find your next great book to read
posts.excerpt: Book Awards can be a source of great book recommendations. Here are five prestigious book awards to keep in mind.

posts.title: 2019 Venice Film Festival winners include the new Joker movie and Roman Polanski
posts.excerpt: Todd Phillips's Joker got the Golden Lion for best movie; Roman Polanski won the Grand Jury Prize for An Officer And A Spy. See all competition winners of 2019's Venice Film Festival.
